summary: A simple mod that will allow you too look like Serana.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod that will allow you to create, \"or change with the \'showracemenu\' console command,\" a character that is identical to Serana, \"minus the hair and red eyes.\" Just select the LAST Breton female preset.

 I made this for myself because I couldn\'t find a similar mod on the nexus. I have no experience making mods, but creating a copy of an NPC via the Creation Kit is pretty simple. 

If your Serana looks different than the one in my game, it is because I am using additional mods that modify hair and face textures. These additional mods can be found here. 

Better Females by Bella - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
ApachiiSky Hair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

There shouldn\'t be any compatibility issues and load order wont matter. I would recommend placing the .esp high in your load order though, just in case. Use NMM for instillation or just put the .esp in your data file.
author: SoulCannon
